pickOne: **Lawful** - Deny mercy to a criminal or unbeliever.
**Good** - Endanger yourself to protect someone weaker than you.

title: Race
pickOne: Human - When you **pray for guidance, even for a moment and ask "what here is evil?"** the GM will tell you, honestly.

title: Quest
description: When you **dedicate yourself to a mission** through prayer and ritual cleansing, state what you set out to do:

title: Divine Favor
description: Dedicate yourself to a deity (name a new one or choose one that's already been established). You gain the commune and cast a spell cleric moves. When you select this move, treat yourself as a cleric of level 1 for using spells. Every time you gain a level thereafter, increase your effective cleric level by 1.

title: Bloody Aegis
description: When you **take damage** you can grit your teeth and accept the blow. If you do you take no damage but instead suffer a debility of your choice. If you already have all six debilities you can't use this move.

title: Smite
description: While on a Quest you deal +1d4 damage.

title: Holy Protection
description: You get +1 armor while on a Quest.

title: Voice Of Authority
description: Take +1 to order hirelings.

title: Hospitaller
description: When you **heal an ally**, you heal +1d8 damage.

title: Exterminatus
description: When you **speak aloud your promise to defeat an enemy**, you deal +2d4 damage against that enemy and -4 damage against anyone else. This effect lasts until the enemy is defeated. If you fail to defeat the enemy or give up the fight, you can admit your failure, but the effect continues until you find a way to redeem yourself.

title: Charge!
description: When you **lead the charge into combat**, those you lead take **+1 forward**.

title: Staunch Defender
description: When you **Defend** you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-.

title: Setup Strike
description: When you **Hack & Slash**, choose an ally. Their next attack against your target does +1d4 damage.

title: Evidence Of Faith (Requires level 6+)
description:
Requires: **Divine Favor**

When you **see divine magic as it happens**, you can ask the GM which deity granted the spell and its effects. Take +1 when acting on the answers.

title: Holy Smite (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Smite**

While on a Quest you deal +1d8 damage.

title: Ever Onward (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Charge!**

When you **lead the charge into combat**, those you lead take +1 forward and +2 armor forward.

title: Impervious Defender (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Staunch Defender**

When you **Defend** you always get +1 hold, even on a 6-. When you get a 12+ to defend instead of getting hold the nearest attacking creature is stymied giving you a clear advantage, the GM will describe it.

title: Perfect Knight (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **Quest** you choose three boons instead of two.

title: Tandem Strike (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Setup Strike**

When you **Hack & Slash**, choose an ally. Their next attack against your target does +1d4 damage and they take **+1 forward** against them.

title: Divine Protection (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Holy Protection**

You get +2 armor while on a Quest.

title: Divine Authority (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Voice Of Authority**

Take +1 to order hirelings. When you roll a 12+ the hireling transcends their moment of fear and doubt and carries out your order with particular effectiveness or efficiency.

title: Perfect Hospitaller (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Hospitaller**

When you **heal an ally**, you heal +2d8 damage.

title: Indomitable (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **suffer a debility** (even through Bloody Aegis) take +1 forward against whatever caused it.

title: Lay On Hands (+CHA)
description: When you **touch someone**, skin to skin, and pray for their well-being, roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: You heal 1d8 damage or remove one disease.
They are healed, but the damage or disease is transferred to you.

title: I Am The Law (+CHA)
description: When you give an NPC an order based on your divine authority, roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: They choose one, and you take **+1 forward** against them:
They do as they please and you take **-1 forward** against them.

title: Armored
description: You ignore the **clumsy** tag on armor you wear.
